statements: SELECT * FROM market_reports
SELECT report_id, neighborhood_name, property_value FROM market_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT neighborhood_name, property_value FROM market_reports WHERE market_trend = 'Stable' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT AVG(property_value) AS avg_value, market_trend FROM market_reports GROUP BY market_trend
SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM market_reports GROUP BY neighborhood_name HAVING total_reports >= 3
SELECT * FROM market_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, property_value ASC;
SELECT report_id, neighborhood_name, property_value FROM market_reports WHERE market_trend='Increasing' ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT report_id, neighborhood_name, report_date FROM market_reports WHERE property_value > 500000 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(property_value) AS avg_property_value, market_trend FROM market_reports GROUP BY market_trend;
SELECT neighborhood_name, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM market_reports GROUP BY neighborhood_name HAVING num_reports > 3 ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT neighborhood, property_value FROM MarketTrends WHERE property_value > 50000;
SELECT report_id, market_trend FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestorReports WHERE investment_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT investor_name, neighborhood_interest FROM InvestorReports WHERE neighborhood_interest = 'Luxury';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT report_id, neighborhood, market_trend FROM MarketTrends WHERE property_value > 100000 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, investment_amount FROM InvestorReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY investor_id DESC;
SELECT neighborhood, COUNT(DISTINCT market_trend) AS unique_trends FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY neighborhood HAVING unique_trends > 1;

SELECT * FROM MarketTrends JOIN InvestorReports ON MarketTrends.neighborhood = InvestorReports.neighborhood WHERE InvestorReports.investment_amount > 50000 ORDER BY property_value ASC, investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM upscale_neighborhoods;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_property_value FROM upscale_neighborhoods ORDER BY median_property_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM real_estate_investors WHERE investment_amount > 100000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, property_value FROM upscale_neighborhoods JOIN market_reports ON upscale_neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = market_reports.neighborhood_id ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM upscale_neighborhoods WHERE median_property_value > 500000 ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_property_value FROM upscale_neighborhoods WHERE median_property_value < 300000 ORDER BY median_property_value DESC;

SELECT rn.neighborhood_name, COUNT(*) AS report_count FROM upscale_neighborhoods rn JOIN market_reports mr ON rn.neighborhood_id = mr.neighborhood_id GROUP BY rn.neighborhood_name ORDER BY report_count DESC;
SELECT investor_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM real_estate_investors GROUP BY investor_name HAVING total_investment > 1000000 ORDER BY total_investment DESC;

SELECT rn.neighborhood_name, MAX(property_value) AS max_property_value FROM upscale_neighborhoods rn JOIN market_reports mr ON rn.neighborhood_id = mr.neighborhood_id GROUP BY rn.neighborhood_name ORDER BY max_property_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrendsReports;
SELECT property_address, value_estimate FROM PropertyValuesReports WHERE value_estimate > 100000;
SELECT * FROM Investors ORDER BY investor_name DESC;
SELECT neighborhood, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM MarketTrendsReports GROUP BY neighborhood;
SELECT investor_name, email FROM Investors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrendsReports ORDER BY neighborhood DESC;
SELECT report_id, trend_analysis FROM MarketTrendsReports WHERE neighborhood = 'Midtown';
SELECT property_address, value_estimate, market_analysis FROM PropertyValuesReports WHERE value_estimate > 500000 ORDER BY value_estimate ASC;
SELECT investor_name, email, amount_invested FROM Investors JOIN Investments ON Investors.investor_id = Investments.investor_id WHERE amount_invested > 10000;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrendsReports WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' AND trend_analysis LIKE '%growth%';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT property_type, neighborhood, market_value FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY market_value DESC
SELECT DISTINCT neighborhood FROM PropertyValues
SELECT investor_name, contact_email FROM Investors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT neighborhood_name, upscale_score FROM Neighborhoods WHERE upscale_score > 7
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY report_date DESC, market_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_type, AVG(market_value) AS avg_market_value FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY property_type;
SELECT neighborhood, COUNT(*) AS properties_count FROM PropertyValues GROUP BY neighborhood HAVING properties_count > 10 ORDER BY properties_count DESC;

SELECT investor_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM Investors JOIN Investments ON Investors.investor_id = Investments.investor_id GROUP BY investor_id HAVING total_investment > 10000 ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, upscale_score FROM Neighborhoods WHERE upscale_score >= 8 ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC LIMIT 5;
